title: YouTube Long Form Video Creator
job_overview: In need of a YouTube Long Form Video Creator for an evergreen YouTube channel that I want to start. A gig job at first. I have scripts written out and audio capabilities/recordings but need help on video creation that has closed captioning, watermarks, transitions intro, outro and aftereffects. Open for collaboration and for your creativity to shine in my channel. Will also need help on YT thumbnails, SEO and everything related to grow a YT channel.
